input: The API is returning 500 errors when I try to fetch user data from /api/users endpoint. This started about 2 hours ago.
subject: API 500 errors
context: Pro tier customer, developer using API

input: I'm getting SSL certificate errors when trying to connect to your service. My browser says the certificate is invalid.
subject: SSL certificate error
context: Customer using older browser, certificate valid

input: The mobile app keeps crashing whenever I try to upload a file larger than 10MB. I'm on iOS 17.
subject: App crashes on large file upload
context: Known issue with iOS 17, workaround available

input: My webhook integration stopped working suddenly. I'm not receiving any POST requests to my endpoint anymore.
subject: Webhook not firing
context: Developer customer, webhooks configured 3 months ago

input: I can't log in to the dashboard. The page just keeps loading indefinitely with a spinner.
subject: Dashboard won't load
context: Basic tier customer, possibly browser cache issue

input: The data export feature is not working. I click Export but nothing happens, no download starts.
subject: Export feature broken
context: Pro customer trying to export large dataset

input: I'm experiencing very slow performance when loading my dashboard. It used to be instant but now takes 30+ seconds.
subject: Slow dashboard performance

input: My API key stopped working this morning. I'm getting 401 Unauthorized errors on all requests.
subject: API authentication failing
context: Developer customer, API key may have expired

input: I'm trying to integrate your SDK with my Node.js app but getting module not found errors. I followed the docs exactly.
subject: SDK integration issue
context: New developer customer, likely installation issue

input: The search functionality isn't returning any results even though I know the data exists in my account.
subject: Search not working
context: Pro customer, possible search index rebuild needed
